long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Capture the Night Sky at Its Best!

Astrophotography enthusiasts, this extension is tailor-made for you! With the "Astrophotography Planner", you can effortlessly plan your night sky photography sessions around the new moon dates, ensuring you capture the cosmos in all its glory - all for free!

Key Features:
- Upcoming New Moon Dates: At a glance, view the next three upcoming new moon dates, the best times for astrophotography.
- Reminders: Never miss a perfect night! Set reminders to notify you a few days before the new moon.
- Dark Sky Map Integration: Find areas with minimal light pollution using our integrated Dark Sky Map link.
- Weather Forecast: Plan ahead with a direct link to long-range weather forecasts, ensuring clear skies for your shoot.
- Feedback & Support: We value your input! For suggestions or issues, our dedicated team is just an email away.

Why New Moon dates?
The new moon phase offers the darkest skies, making it the prime time for astrophotographers to capture celestial wonders without the interference of moonlight. This extension simplifies the planning process, providing all essential information in one place.

Whether you're a seasoned astrophotographer or just starting out, the "Astrophotography Planner" is your companion for perfectly timed sessions under the stars. Brought to you by Skies & Scopes, the trusted name in astrophotography insights and guides.
